Subject: Re: War and Peace
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

As soon as Wildrider lands from his successful hit, he starts moving again
dodging most of the shots, a few bounce on to his armor. He speeds away to
find a new target, perfect, he skids to a stop and transforms, beside
Dead-End. "You okay buddy" he says in an accusing tone. He then turns to
Khonkolor and fires his Scattershot laser gun. Ripping the air with 16
laser beams.
